query:
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.balance, u.role, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE referredBy = u.id) as total_referrals,
       (SELECT SUM(amount) FROM transactions WHERE userId = u.id AND type = 'referral_bonus') as total_referral_bonuses
FROM users u 
WHERE u.email = 'fcokelrihbrito@gmail.com'
